1.title: Global Warming: Science Vs. Skeptics

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

1.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, examines the tension between religious ideology and scientific thoughts in the public arena.

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

2.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, weighs the impact of Sir Isaac Newton's contribution to mankind's development.

4.title: The Next Sputnik Moment

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

4.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, examines the scientific powerhouses of the 20th century and how the U.S. is falling behind.

5.title: What Do You Say to Science Doubters?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

5.plot: Lisa Randall, theoretical physicist and leading particle and cosmology expert, theorizes on why some individuals don't base their understanding on science.

6.title: Who Inspired You to Become a Physicist?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

6.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, relates his love for Saturday morning television and its impact on his professional life.

7.title: Why Do Teens Lose Interest in Science?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

7.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, discusses the failure to encourage students' sustained interest in the sciences.

8.title: Will Science Solve the Problems of the Future?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

8.plot: Lisa Randall, theoretical physicist and leading particle and cosmology expert, outlines the importance of using science to tackle long-term global issues.

9.title: The Challenge of Protecting Endangered Species

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

9.plot: NOAA Administrator Kathryn Sullivan describes the challenge of protecting endangered species in our world's oceans and coastal zones.

10.title: Advice for Young Scientists

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science in Society (TV Series 2015)

10.plot: Former NASA Astronaut Kathryn Sullivan, the first American woman to walk in space, describes the excitement of real-world science beyond the classroom.
